titleStmt.title: Iniunctions gyuen by th [sic] auctoritie of the kynges highnes to the clergie of this his realme
Injunctions. 1538
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A00091 of text S108738 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 10085). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 14 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 3 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: Iniunctions gyuen by th [sic] auctoritie of the kynges highnes to the clergie of this his realme
Injunctions. 1538
titleStmt.author: Church of England.
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: Thomas Berthelet Regius impressor excudebat. Cum privilegio,

notesStmt.note: Addressed to the Church of England.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.

An edition, with additions, of STC 10084.7. An added injunction requires provision of a Latin and an English Bible and encouragement of laymen to read them. The inner forme is in 2 settings; pi1v line 2 has "shall" (Cambridge University Library copy) or "shal" (Corpus Christi College (University of Cambridge). Library copy)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
